snippet.title: Arkista's Ring (American Sammy, 1990) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
Arkista's Ring is an extremely pleasant action/adventure... More game featuring cute enemies, soothing music and an elf girl as the main character. The 125 stages are chock-full of weapon power-ups and other useful items, and each mission is very straightforward. The gameplay depth may pale in comparison to The Legend of Zelda, but Arkista's Ring could serve as the perfect beginner's guide to action RPGs.  Brett Alan Weiss, All Game Guide


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
